# Tailwind Plus Elements

<img src="https://assets.tailwindcss.com/tailwind-plus-elements/hero.png" />

Tailwind Plus Elements is a JavaScript component library used to power the interactive behavior in the HTML snippets in [Tailwind Plus](https://tailwindcss.com/plus). Elements includes the following components:

- Autocomplete
- Command palette
- Dialog
- Disclosure
- Dropdown menu
- Popover
- Select
- Tabs

## License required

A commercial license is required to use Tailwind Plus Elements. Purchase [Tailwind Plus](https://tailwindcss.com/plus) to obtain a license.

## Documentation

You can find the Tailwind Plus Elements documentation on the Tailwind Plus website at [https://tailwindcss.com/plus/ui-blocks/documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/plus/ui-blocks/documentation).
